short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a timer to help you keep your break time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimalist floating timer that stays with you anywhere on your webpage. Perfect for quick breaks and time management.

### Key Features:
- Quick preset timers (1, 3, 5, and 10 minutes)
- Floating timer window that moves anywhere on your webpage
- Clean, minimalist interface
- One-click timer selection
- Stays on top while browsing
- No complex settings or configurations needed

### Perfect For:
- Quick coffee breaks
- Short reading pauses
- Micro-break management
- Anyone who appreciates simplicity

### How to Use:
1. Click the SnackTime icon
2. Select your desired time preset
3. Drag the timer wherever you want on the page
4. Start/Stop with a single click

### Why Choose SnackTime:
- Ultra-lightweight
- No unnecessary permissions
- Zero learning curve
- Stays out of your way until you need it

Keep it simple, keep it effective. SnackTime - because sometimes less is more.
